metadata.title: CVE-2024-2651 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions before16.9.7, all versions starting from 16.10 before 16.10.5, all versionsstarting from 16.11 before 16.11.2. It was possible for an attacker tocause a denial of service using maliciously crafted markdown content.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
